# [FEAT] Ticket Forms

## Labels
`core`, `customization`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement multiple ticket forms to collect different information based on ticket type or request category.

## Requirements

### Form Types
- Default ticket form
- Category-specific forms
- Customer type-specific forms
- Channel-specific forms
- Internal vs. external forms

### Form Builder
- Drag-and-drop form designer
- Add/remove/reorder fields
- Field grouping and sections
- Conditional field logic
- Form preview

### Form Configuration
- Form name and description
- Active/inactive status
- Default form setting
- Form-specific custom fields
- Required fields per form

### Form Assignment
- Auto-select form based on category
- Customer-selectable form
- Form switching during ticket lifecycle
- Form data migration on switch

### Form Features
- Field validation rules
- Help text and instructions
- Multi-language form content
- Form versioning
- Form analytics (completion rates)

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports multiple ticket forms to collect relevant information based on the type of request.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Multiple forms creatable
- [ ] Form builder functional
- [ ] Conditional logic works
- [ ] Form auto-selection works
- [ ] Forms properly validated
